<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return [[true]] if vehicle has enabled auto hover. (always returns false if the vehicle can't set auto hover)

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isAutoHoverOn''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code> _isOn <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''isAutoHoverOn''' [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part></template>
